about_the_game: The PASSAGE™ Demo gives you the first 2 sections of the game for absolutely nothing. All the weapons are here, all the power-ups, all the mayhem...take it for a spin today!

content_descriptors.notes: Violence and gore with some depictions of nudity.

detailed_description: The PASSAGE™ Demo gives you the first 2 sections of the game for absolutely nothing. All the weapons are here, all the power-ups, all the mayhem...take it for a spin today!
legal_notice: PASSAGE ©2018 Magic Time Software. All rights reserved.
name: PASSAGE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: 2.0
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Score-chasing/leaderboard functionality requires internet connection.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: 2.5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Score-chasing/leaderboard functionality requires internet connection. An Xbox One, Xbox 360, or DualShock 4 game controller is recommended for best gameplay experience.

short_description: PASSAGE™ is medieval mayhem in a dark twisted world that's constantly changing. Grab hold of modern artillery, magical power-ups, and your trusty old axe in this adventure to rescue twin girls taken for a truly unholy sacrifice.
